How do I play this file?:

1. Download and install any DVD mounting program, such as the free Daemon Tools Lite or the more diverse Alcohol 120%: <a href="
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4826678/Alcohol_120__v1.9.8.7530_Patch(latest)_%5B_kentuckykiid_%5D" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4826678/Alcohol_120__v1.9.8.7530_Patch(latest)_%5B_kentuckykiid_%5D</a>

2. Open the .iso file with the program.

3. Make sure the program created a virtual disc drive. You'll see this within My Computer. It'll typically claim to be an HD-DVD drive, or a Blu-ray drive; depending on the program you use.

4. Mount the file using the program to the virtual disc drive. On Alcohol 120%, you can do this by just right-clicking the file within the program and selecting the option to mount it. If the movie doesn't play automatically, go to My Computer and double-click the virtual drive. Your default DVD-playing program should open up.

Alternatively, you can use the program to burn the .iso to a blank DVD, and then it will be playable on any typical DVD player.
